name: Hitman: World of Assassination - The Undying
summary: The Undying Elusive Target featuring Sean Bean finally returns to the World of Assassination. Mark Faba is famous for his uncanny ability to rise from the dead, having been confirmed killed more than 25 times. It is now your job to finally put the Undying in the ground… for good!

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Hitman World of Assassination: The Undying - Official Trailer | IGN Fan Fest 2024
